p: However, the inhibitory activity of each ethanol extract of H. erinaceus toward AChE was significantly ( p < 0.001) lower than that of galantamine, the positive control. A previous study reported that the percentage of acetylcholinesterase inhibition activity in the fungal species Pleurotus pulmonarius ranged from 57.24 to 69.05% at concentrations of 0.063â€“1.0 mg/mL [ 48].
